akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Notwithstanding sections 1712 and 1713 of title 43 and subject to valid existing rights, not later than 1 year after November 6, 2002, the Secretary shall convey to the highest qualified bidder all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to the Federal parcel.
(b) Disposition of proceeds Of the gross proceeds from the conveyance of land under subsection (a)—
